message:
Fixed potential NPEs if the Authentication has not been initialized before saving the editor.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@660189 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

o Fixed a NPE when saving a newly created server configuration.
o Removed the testing Main class.
o Renamed the SaveableFormPage class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@656558 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

file.patch: @@ -30,7 +30,7 @@ * @author Apache Directory Project * @version $Rev$, $Date$ */ -public interface SavableFormPage extends IFormPage +public interface SaveableFormPage extends IFormPage { /** * Saves the necessary elements to the input model.

message:
Fixed a NPE when the "dependenciesMap.get( at )" or "dependenciesMap.get( oc )" instructions was returning null.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@607243 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a NPE which caused the SchemaBrowser to not be opened correctly.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@588628 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a NPE in the Schema Editor.
Added "(None)" syntax and matching rules to the NewAttributeTypeWizard.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@571492 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed potential NPE when using the first alias of an AT/OC.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@559498 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed potential NPE if an attribute type, object class, matching rule or syntax does not have any alias.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@559434 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fix a bug which caused a NPE when an OC or AT does not have any alias.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@559074 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a bug in the DifferenceEngine. The wrong schema (which was null) was used, causing an NPE.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@558631 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added SchemaHandler listener to the ObjectClassEditor.
Fixed a NPE in the Overview Page and in the SuperiorsTableContentProvider.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@553910 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added SchemaHandler listener to the AttributeTypeEditor.
Fixed the SourceCode page.
Fixed a NPE in the UsedBy Page.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@553904 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed the build on Mac OS X and an NPE when loading the Welcome Perspective.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@546150 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

file.patch:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@
             <equals arg1="${studio-rcp.os.name}" arg2="win32"/>
         </or>
     </condition>
-    <condition property="studio-complete.build" value="${studio-complete.output}/studio" >
+    <condition property="studio-complete.build" value="${studio-complete.output}/ApacheDirectoryStudio" >
             <equals arg1="${studio-rcp.os.name}" arg2="linux"/>
     </condition>
 	
@@ -288,7 +288,7 @@
     <!--        Set Right Permissions       -->
     <!-- ================================== -->
     <target name="setPermission_macosx" description="Sets the right permissions on Mac OS X">
-        <chmod file="${studio-complete.build}/Apache Directory Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/studio" perm="755"/>
+        <chmod file="${studio-complete.build}/Apache Directory Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/ApacheDirectoryStudio" perm="755"/>
     </target>
     
     <target name="setPermission_linux" description="Sets the right permissions on Linux">

message:
o Fixed a potential NPE in the cipyListString() method, when the arguments is null
o The olcReverseLookup is a boolean, not a String
o The olcRootDSE ius a MV attribute

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@1686953 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Created and injected the cache service that is necessary for the partition to be loaded, otherwise we get a NPE at some point while reading the config.ldif file

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/branches/studio-tycho@1650697 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fix for DIRSTUDIO-833 (NPE in ACI Item Editor when adding AttributeType permission).
The 'precedence' variable is now an Integer (Object) instead of an int (primitive type). Added null checks.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@1397019 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved the methods used to the new Schema API.
Fixed a few NPEs in the Schema Browser of the LDAP Browser.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/branches/shared-trunk-merge@1005807 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Multiple deployment needs a pom to get older versions from pom.xml (even when not generate) -> cause NPE -> maybe a bug ... hence create this pom.xml and make maven happy

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/trunk@639472 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

     We presume that all needed dependencies are already somehow available (normally this is the case with mvn install from root)

message:
Lots of cleanup :
o Log addition
o Javadoc  addition and cleanup
o Code formatting
o Fixed the NPE we got while opening the Apache DS 2.0 config (the LDAP partition was not correctly initialized, the CacheService was null)

Added feature :
o Added the support of SASL realms

Missing parts :
o Correct support of enabled protocols and ciphers.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/directory/studio/branches/studio-tycho@1653313 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
